    Ingredients: Warm water 1 medium glass (200 ml), fenugreek seeds 1 tsp soaked, almonds 4 soaked • Method: Strained / eaten • Time: 5 min • Serving Size: 1 glass + 4 almonds • Nutritive Values: 70 kcal | 3 g protein | 4 g carbs | 5 g fat | 2 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 70, protein: 3, carbs: 4
  • Cinnamon + Flax Water
    Ingredients: Warm water 1 medium glass (200 ml), cinnamon ¼ tsp, flaxseed powder 1 tsp • Method: Mixed • Time: 5 min • Serving Size: 1 glass • Nutritive Values: 80 kcal | 2 g protein | 5 g carbs | 6 g fat | 3 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 80, protein: 2, carbs: 5

Evening Snack ():
  • Roasted Makhana (40 g) + Green Tea
    Ingredients: Makhana 40 g, ghee/oil ¼ tsp, green tea 1 cup (no sugar) • Method: Roast makhana lightly • Time: 5 min • Serving Size: 1 bowl + tea • Nutritive Values: 200 kcal | 10 g protein | 18 g carbs | 6 g fat | 3 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 200, protein: 10, carbs: 18
  • Vegetable Soup + Grilled Tofu (60 g)
    Ingredients: Mixed vegetables ½ cup, tofu 60 g, pepper pinch, oil ¼ tsp • Method: Boiled soup; grill tofu • Time: 10–12 min • Serving Size: 1 bowl soup + tofu cubes • Nutritive Values: 230 kcal | 22 g protein | 12 g carbs | 8 g fat | 3 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 230, protein: 22, carbs: 12

Breakfast ():
  • Ragi Dosa (2) + Protein Sambar (½ katori)
    Ingredients: Ragi flour ½ cup, urad dal 2 tbsp (for sambar), mixed vegetables ¼ cup, oil ½ tsp • Method: Batter / pan-roast dosas; sambar boiled • Time: 20–25 min • Serving Size: 2 dosas + ½ katori sambar • Nutritive Values: 420 kcal | 22 g protein | 46 g carbs | 9 g fat | 6 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 420, protein: 22, carbs: 46
  • Moong Dal Cheela (2) + Mint-Coconut Chutney (1 tbsp)
    Ingredients: Split moong ½ cup (soaked & ground), spinach 2 tbsp, oil ½ tsp, coconut 1 tbsp in chutney • Method: Grind / pan-roast cheelas / blend chutney • Time: 20 min • Serving Size: 2 cheelas + 1 tbsp chutney • Nutritive Values: 410 kcal | 28 g protein | 36 g carbs | 10 g fat | 6 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 410, protein: 28, carbs: 36

Bedtime ():
  • Warm Skim Milk + Turmeric + Flax (1 tsp)
    Ingredients: Skim milk 1 small glass (150 ml), turmeric ¼ tsp, flaxseed 1 tsp • Method: Warm & mix • Time: 5 min • Serving Size: 1 glass • Nutritive Values: 140 kcal | 10 g protein | 10 g carbs | 4 g fat | 2 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 140, protein: 10, carbs: 10
  • Chamomile Tea + 3 Soaked Almonds
    Ingredients: Chamomile tea 1 cup, almonds 3 soaked • Method: Steep & eat • Time: 5 min • Serving Size: 1 cup + almonds • Nutritive Values: 90 kcal | 4 g protein | 4 g carbs | 6 g fat | 1 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 90, protein: 4, carbs: 4

Dinner ():
  • Millet Khichdi + Cabbage Salad
    Ingredients: Foxtail millet ½ cup (raw), moong dal 3 tbsp, bottle gourd ¼ cup, cumin ¼ tsp, oil ½ tsp • Method: Boiled / sautéed lightly • Time: 25 min • Serving Size: 1 bowl khichdi + ¼ bowl salad • Nutritive Values: 420 kcal | 24 g protein | 40 g carbs | 8 g fat | 6 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 420, protein: 24, carbs: 40
  • Ragi Rotis (2) + Palak Paneer (paneer 60 g) + Raw Salad
    Ingredients: Ragi flour ½ cup, paneer 60 g, spinach ½ cup, oil ½ tsp • Method: Roti rolled & roasted; palak paneer sautéed with minimal oil • Time: 25 min • Serving Size: 2 rotis + ½ katori curry + ¼ salad • Nutritive Values: 480 kcal | 32 g protein | 38 g carbs | 12 g fat | 6 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 480, protein: 32, carbs: 38

Lunch ():
  • Brown Rice (½ cup) + Protein-Rich Sambar + Cabbage-Carrot Poriyal
    Ingredients: Brown rice ½ cup (raw), toor + moong dal combined 3 tbsp (in sambar), cabbage ¼ cup, carrot 2 tbsp, oil ½ tsp • Method: Boiled (rice) / Pressure-cook dal for sambar / sauté poriyal • Time: 25–30 min • Serving Size: 1 bowl rice + ½ katori sambar + ¼ katori poriyal • Nutritive Values: 520 kcal | 28 g protein | 58 g carbs | 11 g fat | 8 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 520, protein: 28, carbs: 58
  • 2 Multigrain Chapatis + Rajma Curry (protein) + Mixed Salad
    Ingredients: Multigrain flour (atta+millet) ½ cup, rajma ¼ cup cooked, cucumber+tomato ¼ cup, oil ½ tsp • Method: Make phulkas / rajma pressure-cooked & spiced / raw salad • Time: 25–30 min • Serving Size: 2 chapatis + ½ katori rajma + ¼ katori salad • Nutritive Values: 540 kcal | 30 g protein | 56 g carbs | 12 g fat | 8 g fiber
    Nutrition: calories: 540, protein: 30, carbs: 56
